name: Weirdo Gang #5148
description: Hey man are you looking out of place in your company, are you walking alone and feel uneasy because of loneliness, are you tired of the boring life, then join us, we are looking for 5555 weird punk companions, and in Hold a party on Ethereum, which will be joined in the form of pfp NFT. If you are close to each other, you will find friends with the same interests here. We will bring you the game of weirdo gang and set up the weirdo gang Metaverse Venture Fund, you will be proud to have our nft. Trust us this is just the beginning.
